interventions.name: External Insulation
interventions.description: Installation of an external insulation system

interventions.name: Technical pre-work inspection
interventions.description: Technical pre-work inspection. The quality of the façade needs to be checked, some measure be performed, and the accessibility needs to be ensures.

interventions.name: Façade preparation
interventions.description: Install claddings and prepare the façade for the installation of the insulation system

interventions.name: Rails installation
interventions.description: Installation of the rails supporting the system. Drill holes, install rails, cut angles.
checks: Check height from ground (FR: 3cm from concrete ground; 15cm for grass/clay
Holes must be separated by approximately 30cm

interventions.name: Installation of insulation panels
interventions.description: Installation of the insulation panels. Cut the panels. Paste/fix them. Insulation of framings. Fix the panels with screws

interventions.name: Sub-coating
interventions.description: Apply sub-coating to protect the panels
checks: Install a glass mesh on top of the façade

interventions.name: Finishing
interventions.description: Install the finishing. Could be wooden panels, coating...
